skins.shipDescription: Allen M. Sumner-class destroyer ¨C Cooper, Hull Number DD-695.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm an Allen M. Sumner-class destroyer, Cooper! I fought alongside Allen M. Sumner and Moale at Ormoc Bay, but I guess I didn't try hard enough... Nnng, damn it! How was I supposed to pick out anything like those oxygen torpedoes!
skins.acquisition: Hey Commander, I'm Cooper! Let's join forces and fight for the future of the world! Booyah!
skins.login: It's nice to see your smiling face, Commander! Heh heh!
skins.details: I have an incredible power inside me that will burst forth to save everyone at that critical moment... Yeah! That would be badass!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Paperwork? How does that help in a fight?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Aaahhh~ I just lose it whenever I see a kitty cat. Commander, let's keep one in the office, a black one!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey... how long are we gonna stay in the office? I'm so bored...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, do you understand what you're doing here?

skins.acquisition: 30 to 15... Next match will be mine, you hear! Oh, Commander, are you here to play a round of tennis?
skins.login: Watch me beat this Sakura girl... then it's you and me, Commander!
skins.details: I never thought a game of afternoon tennis would be so exhausting... Huh? What's up, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: This is for me? Alright...! Glug glug... Haah!
skins.secretaryIdle3: A black kitty cat! Where is it...?! Hey now, don't distract me!
skins.secretaryTouch: Y-you probably shouldn't touch me. I'm all sweaty right now.

skins.shipDescription: Hm? I'm just wrapping up some presents! Can't just present them as-is, and all that. Hehe~ I could sure use a little help, Commander!
